Module com.example.cs230assignment
Package com.example.cs230assignment

Class LoseMenu

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
com.example.cs230assignment.LoseMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class LoseMenu extends javafx.stage.Stage
The Lose Menu class. It creates the window that appears when the player loses the game which contains a button to retry the game and a button to quit the game.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas McAuley, Fraser Clough
